name: Buck - A game about a real dog
blurb: 2D Action-Adventure, nonlinear, Metroidvania style beat'em up with player driven dialogues and weapon customization.

rewards.reward:
Basic Backer Copy
============================= 
THE GAME (Digital)
=============================
You can choose between a DRM free version or a Steam Key (If applicable). 

The planned price for the game is $20 so Kickstarter backers get the game for half price.

Special Backer Copy
=============================
The Game (Digital) + BEHIND THE SCENES 
=============================
You'll receive a PDF booklet that contains the following: all of the game's concept art, the story behind every character, location designs and a game manual. Additionally you'll receive a full commentary audio track that you can listen to while looking through the PDF.
You'll also receive a hi-res wallpaper to decorate your PC, Tablet or Smartphone.

Beta Tester
=============================
The Game (Digital) + Behind The Scenes + CLOSED BETA ACCESS
=============================
You'll receive access to our closed beta (TBA) which will come hand in hand with exclusive backer forum access. This means future design decisions will be shared and discussed with you exclusively. Plus your name will appear in the game's end credits under the "Kickstarter Beta Testers" category.
______________________________
*All previous reward tiers included.

Instrumentalist
=============================
The Game (Digital) + Behind The Scenes + Closed Beta Access + OFFICIAL SOUNDTRACK
=============================
You'll receive a digital album containing all of the game's soundtrack. Check out the "Rewards in Depth" section of the Kickstarter page for a preview of the soundtrack.
______________________________
*All previous reward tiers included.

Pet Sketch - Lite
=============================
The Game (Digital) + Behind The Scenes + Closed Beta Access + Official Soundtrack + YOUR PET'S PICTURE & SKETCH IN THE CREDITS
=============================
You'll send us a picture of your pet with a short description of their personality. Our artist will draw a black and white character sketch which will be placed in the end game credits under a special "Buck's Kickstarter Pals" category with both of your names. 
______________________________
*All previous reward tiers included
______________________________
To avoid any misunderstandings, please read the "Rewards in Depth" section for the full details.

Wardrobe Warrior
=============================
The Game (Digital) + Behind The Scenes + Closed Beta Access + Official Soundtrack + EXCLUSIVE BACKER T-SHIRT
=============================
You'll receive a special, limited edition T-Shirt to show off to the whole world!
______________________________
*All previous reward tiers included.

Collector
=============================
The Game (Digital) + Behind The Scenes + Closed Beta Access + Official Soundtrack + EXCLUSIVE LIMITED EDITION DVD CASE
=============================
You'll get a physical copy of Buck's game alongside an additional DIGITAL copy to give to a friend.
______________________________
*All previous reward tiers included EXCLUDING the T-SHIRT.
______________________________
To avoid any misunderstandings, please read the "Rewards in Depth" section for the full details.

Pet Sketch
=============================
The Game (Digital) + Behind The Scenes + Closed Beta Access + Official Soundtrack + Limited Edition DVD Case + YOUR PET'S PICTURE & SKETCH IN THE CREDITS
=============================
You'll send us a picture of your pet with a short description of their personality. Our artist will draw a black and white character sketch which will be placed in the end game credits under a special "Buck's Kickstarter Pals" category with both of your names. 
______________________________
*All previous reward tiers included EXCLUDING the T-SHIRT.
______________________________
To avoid any misunderstandings, please read the "Rewards in Depth" section for the full details.

True Collector
=============================
The Game (Digital) + Behind The Scenes + Closed Beta Access + Official Soundtrack + Limited Edition DVD Case + LIMITED EDITION POSTER
=============================
You'll receive 
A limited edition 70 x 100 cm poster signed by the team with your name on it.
______________________________
*All previous reward tiers included EXCLUDING the T-SHIRT, PET SKETCH.
______________________________
To avoid any misunderstandings, please read the "Rewards in Depth" section for the full details.

Special Guest Appearance
=============================
The Game (Digital) + Behind The Scenes + Closed Beta Access + Official Soundtrack + Limited Edition DVD Case + Pet Sketch + YOUR PET AS A NON-INTERACTABLE CHARACTER IN THE GAME.
=============================
Your Pet will appear in the actual game as a non-interactable background character. This means they will have their own unique place in the game world with some basic animations and behaviors but without the ability to talk directly to you.
Read the "Rewards in Depth" section for more information.
______________________________
*All previous reward tiers included EXCLUDING the -SHIRT, POSTER and PETS NAME ON A CONSUMABLE TREAT.
______________________________
To avoid any misunderstandings, please read the "Rewards in Depth" section for the full details before backing. Restrictions may apply.

A Known Troublemaker (Dogs or Cats only)
=============================
The Game (Digital) + Behind The Scenes + Closed Beta Access + Official Soundtrack + Limited Edition DVD Case + Pet Sketch + YOUR PET AS AN IN-GAME ENEMY.
=============================
Your pet's head and fur color will be applied to one of the main 3 enemy body types in the game. (Small, Medium and Large - See Picture). This means they will be fully animated with attacks and other battle related animations but will not be interactable for conversation.
______________________________
All previous reward tiers included EXCLUDING the T-SHIRT, POSTER, PETS NAME ON A CONSUMABLE TREAT and PET AS A NON-INTERACTABLE CHARACTER.
______________________________
To avoid any misunderstandings, please read the "Rewards in Depth" section for the full details before backing. Restrictions may apply.

A known Troublemaker With A Poster
=============================
The Game (Digital) + Behind The Scenes + Closed Beta Access + Official Soundtrack + Limited Edition DVD Case + Pet Sketch + Your pet as an in-game enemy + PERSONALLY DESIGNED POSTER FOR YOUR PET.
=============================
You'll receive A personalized 70 x 40 cm poster of your pet fighting Buck in an epic battle. This means your pet will also appear as an in-game enemy but you get a sweet poster to go with it!
______________________________
All previous reward tiers included EXCLUDING the T-SHIRT, POSTER, PET'S NAME ON A CONSUMABLE TREAT and PET AS A NON-INTERACTABLE CHARACTER.
______________________________
To avoid any misunderstandings, please read the "Rewards in Depth" section for the full details before backing. Restrictions may apply.

A Passing Stranger
=============================
The Game (Digital) + Behind The Scenes + Closed Beta Access + Official Soundtrack + Limited Edition DVD Case + Pet Sketch + YOUR PET AS A FULLY VOICED SEMI-INTERACTIVE CHARACTER.
=============================
You'll get to see your pet in the game as a fully voiced, semi-interactive character. This means Buck will be able to talk to your pet in the game but without the full dialogue option like in the "A Familiar Face" reward. (See rewards in depth for the full details.)
______________________________
All previous reward tiers included EXCLUDING the T-SHIRT, POSTER, PET'S NAME ON A CONSUMABLE TREAT, PET AS A NON-INTERACTABLE CHARACTER, ENEMY CHARACTER and PERSONALIZED POSTER.
______________________________
To avoid any misunderstandings, please read the "Rewards in Depth" section for the full details before backing. Restrictions may apply.

A Familiar Face
=============================
The Game (Digital) + Behind The Scenes + Closed Beta Access + Official Soundtrack + Limited Edition DVD Case + Pet Sketch + YOUR PET AS A FULLY VOICED INTERACTABLE CHARACTER.
=============================
You'll get to see your pet in the game as a fully voiced, interactable character. This means Buck will be able talk to your pet in the game and even take a mission from them! You'll be able to see us design your pet on Twitch.tv where you can give us your feedback live! 
______________________________
All previous reward tiers included EXCLUDING the T-SHIRT, POSTER, PET'S NAME ON A CONSUMABLE TREAT, PET AS A NON-INTERACTABLE CHARACTER, ENEMY CHARACTER and PERSONALIZED POSTER.
______________________________
To avoid any misunderstandings, please read the "Rewards in Depth" section for the full details before backing. Restrictions may apply.
